name: Black Diamond Moji Color Lantern
description: Mood lighting on the go.  Equipped with an RGB LED the Moji Color lets you dial in the right colour for your mood. The Moji’s frosted globe delivers a serene, even glow. A dimmer switch lets you set the level of brightness, and it's small enough to fit in your pocket.The RGB LED lets you cycle through all the colours of the rainbow.RGB LED is enclosed in a frosted globe to provide bright, ambient light.Continuous cycling mode takes you through the full colour spectrumCollapsible, double-hook for hanging in the tent or car.Dimmer switch controls light levels.Take 3 AAA batteries (not included).Protected against water to IPX 4 (splashes).
